mapper.select: SELECT cp.course_pay_id, cp.vip_id, v.vip_name, cp.amount, cp.num, cp.points, cp.is_redeem, cp.redeem_num, cp.create_time, cp.expire_time, cp.remarks FROM course_pay cp , vip v WHERE cp.vip_id = v.vip_id ORDER BY cp.course_pay_id

SELECT cp.course_pay_id, cp.vip_id, v.vip_name, cp.amount, cp.num, cp.points, cp.is_redeem, cp.redeem_num, cp.create_time, cp.expire_time, cp.remarks FROM course_pay cp , vip v WHERE cp.course_pay_id = #{coursePayId} AND cp.vip_id = v.vip_id ORDER BY cp.course_pay_id

SELECT cp.course_pay_id, cp.vip_id, v.vip_name, cp.amount, cp.num, cp.points, cp.is_redeem, cp.redeem_num, cp.create_time, cp.expire_time, cp.remarks FROM course_pay cp , vip v WHERE cp.vip_id = #{vip.vipId} AND cp.vip_id = v.vip_id ORDER BY cp.course_pay_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO course_pay (course_pay_id, vip_id, type, amount, num, points, is_redeem, redeem_num, create_time, expire_time, remarks) VALUES (#{coursePayId},#{vip.vipId}, #{type}, #{amount}, #{num}, #{points}, #{isRedeem}, #{redeemNum}, #{createTime}, #{expireTime,},#{remarks})
